attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As opposed to using tax payers money to shore up ailing banks, funds should be given to registered social landlords to purchase homes that are at risk of repossession - people pay rent and retain their homes; the bank's debt is eased; UK social housing stock increases and the government will not have a double problem; failing banks and an increase of homeless people which will put pressure on local authorities

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
